mapper.select: select shw.*, m.title, s.name as screen_name from theater as t join movie as m join screen as s join show_schedule as shw on shw.theater_id = t.theater_id and shw.screen_id = s.screen_id and shw.movie_id = m.movie_id;

SELECT m.movie_id, m.title, m.age_group, m.runningtime, m.poster_img, m.trailer_url, m.on_show, m.still_cut, t.theater_id, t.theater_name, t.region_name, s.screen_id, s.screen_name, s.class_type, s.seat_rows, s.seat_columns, s.seat_rows*seat_columns as total_seats, shw.schedule_id, shw.screen_date, shw.start_time, shw.end_time FROM movie AS m JOIN theater as t JOIN screen AS s JOIN show_schedule as shw ON shw.theater_name = t.theater_name AND shw.screen_id = s.screen_id AND shw.movie_id = m.movie_id WHERE shw.screen_date=#{screen_date} and t.theater_name=#{theater_name} and shw.movie_id=#{movie_id} ORDER BY shw.start_time ASC;
